sub_title: Lead Solutions Architect | Digital Transformation Architect | Digital Commerce Specialist
summary:
* I hold dual citizenship with Brazil and Italy, which allows me to easily work within companies and organizations based in the European Union and Brazil.

* Over 24 years of experience in the IT industry, Bachelor of Science (BSc CIS) in Computer Information Systems at Mackenzie University and Postgraduate Certificate in Software Engineering at UNICAMP University.

* I started my career in software development within Itau-Unibanco bank, through companies such as Hewlett-Packard, Atech, BRQ, IBM, Resource IT Solutions, Grupo SBF and Discover Technology.

* Worked heavily in developing complex solutions in various segments within the Public Sector and Private Sector using best practices and methodologies such as RUP, Agile and Scrum. Participated in the certification process CMM SW-2 when I worked as a Java Programmer Analyst at Atech.

* In the Public Sector, there are the projects for the Federal Police, Aeronautica, Infraero, SEFAZ-SP, among others and Private Sector, stands out projects for ABN-AMRO bank, Itau-Unibanco and Santader bank, ANBIMA, Iguatemi Shopping, TAM Airlines, Nokia Siemens Network, Grupo SBF, Seguros Unimed and Falabella.

* I started working with E-Commerce, and became a specialist in Oracle Commerce Platform (Oracle ATG Web Commerce and Oracle Endeca Search) being part of the team in the implementation, development and deployment of new features of Oracle ATG Commerce solution within SBF Group (centauro.com.br) and continuing work in this area I participated in projects for clients such as Seguros Unimed, Lojas Renner, Fallabella (Chile), Wurth, Passarela and Somos Educação focused on identifying, understanding and continuous improvement for business.


Specialties: Architecture, Cloud Computing, Strategy, Problem-solving, Leadership and team management

profile_positions.description:
As a Lead Solutions Architect my responsibilities can be divided into several key areas, including:

Problem-solving:
I possess a deep understanding of various technologies. I use my experience to design and oversee the implementation of new solutions.
I identify technical problems and work with teams to develop solutions. I evaluate complex technical issues and determine the best course of action to resolve them.

Strategy:
I work closely with other leaders within LeasePlan to develop technology strategies that support their goals. I analyze business requirements and translate them into technical solutions. 

Efficiency:
I manage multiple projects and priorities to ensure that the technology team is meeting the needs of LeasePlan. I prioritize tasks and delegate responsibilities to team members to ensure that all work is completed efficiently.

Communication:
I communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders in a way that they can understand. I work collaboratively with teams and stakeholders to understand their needs and develop solutions that meet those needs. Additionally, I communicate technical issues and solutions to team members and other stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.

Leadership and Team management:
I lead teams of technical professionals to achieve our organization's technology goals. I inspire and motivate teams to achieve their best work. I provide guidance and mentorship to team members to help them grow and develop their skills.
I provide performance feedback and coaching to team members to help them grow and develop their skills. Additionally, I hire and onboard new team members to ensure that we have the skills and expertise that LeasePlan needs.

Soft skills:
I work effectively with people from diverse backgrounds and cultures. I negotiate and resolve conflicts in a way that maintains positive relationships. Additionally, I remain calm and focused under pressure and adapt to changing circumstances.
profile_positions.title: Lead Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description:
- Solving complex challenges while keeping track of the target architecture for multiple segments in many local and global projects.
- Defining and maintaining high and low level architecture. Establishing, maintaining and enforcing architecture standards, principles and models.
- Designing, realizing and supervising the implementation of Cloud solutions and infrastructure.
- Building cloud-optimized architectures and scopes.
- Defining and implementing continuous integration, continuous delivery and release management strategy.

- Applying my experience in inventory related to existing infrastructure and applications, underlying technology migration, operations and data migration.
- I evaluate the impact of changes within the ecosystem of the organization (including political, technical, social, regulatory, legal).
- Proposing enhancements of the existing architecture and business process to improve the efficiency of a procedure and/or simplify the application development/maintenance.

- I have strong knowledge of IT, service-oriented architectures, software development life cycle, information security platforms and applications.
- I have the DNA to deliver end-to-end solutions, integrated processes and implementation of actions that support business needs.

- Key person in the implementation of LeanIX Enterprise Architecture Management (EAM), performing all configurations, and integrations with other tools, and also providing training to teams located in over 30 countries;
- Producing enterprise architecture models and documents, business case, business glossary, architectural vision, reports, supporting business requirements and other relevant documents.

- Strong customer facing interaction. Participation in technical working groups, progress meetings and meetings with the clients and other partners;
- Performing analysis of the Integration of different information systems defining architectural solutions for interoperability.
profile_positions.title: Senior Solutions Architect
Senior Solutions Architect | Digital Commerce Specialist
Senior E-Commerce Solution Architect
E-Commerce Solutions Architect, Software Engineer and Java EE Programmer Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Working with the JEE architecture and E-Commerce using Oracle Commerce Platform (Oracle ATG Web Commerce 10.2 + Oracle Endeca Commerce 3.1.2)

- Responsible for sizing, architectural and technical issues, business process and systems integration on projects based on ATG Web Commerce and Endeca Web Commerce.

- Leading development team for Oracle ATG Web Commerce platform, identifying and implementing continuous improvements to the business and working as Java Atg Developer;

- Relationship with Oracle ATG partner located in California, USA and Oracle Endeca partner located in Ottawa, Canada integrating software development team.

* Project: Insurance Commerce at Seguros Unimed
Description: First insurance company to provide online B2C to contract travel, residential and other kinds of insurance.
Core responsibilities:
- Responsible for creating the E-Commerce solutions landscape to the project;
- Responsible for create and configure an e-Commerce Virtual Machine Environment to Dev Team using Oracle ATG Web Commerce 10.2 and Oracle Endeca Commerce 3.1.2;
- Working on architectural issues such as integration, identifying and implementing continuous improvements to the business;
- Strong relationship with Oracle Endeca Partner located Ottawa, Canada.

* Project: Migration of Oracle ATG Search to Oracle Endeca Search at Falabella
Description: Migration from Oracle ATG Search Engine 9.4 to Oracle Endeca Commerce 3.1.2
Core responsibilities: 
- Identify all business requirements and elaborate documentation to support all steps and infrastructure changes necessary to increase the amount of servers to support the new search engine.

* Project: Setup of Oracle ATG Commerce - Disaster Recover at Lojas Renner
Description: Setup of new Oracle Exalogic and Exadata for Oracle Commerce Platform in São Paulo, Brazil
Core responsibilities: 
- Install and setup all Oracle Commerce Platform in all environments (Continuous Integration, Quality Assurance and Production)
profile_positions.title: E-Commerce Solutions Architect, Designer and Java EE Programmer Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Working with E-Commerce using the Oracle ATG Commerce 9.4 on Centauro.com.br e-Commerce:
- Oracle ATG Web Commerce
- Oracle ATG Web Commerce Search
- Oracle ATG Web Commerce Service Center
- Oracle ATG Web Commerce Merchandising
- Oracle ATG Web Commerce Business Intelligence

Working on implementation of Oracle ATG Web Commerce platform included performing key roles:

- Responsible for configurate an e-Commerce VM Environment to Dev Team for Centauro.com.br;
- Working on-going IT operations for Oracle ATG Web Commerce platform, identifying and implementing continuous improvements to the business;
- Strong relationship with Oracle ATG partner located in California, USA integrating software development team.
profile_positions.title: Java/JEE Architect, Designer and Java EE Programmer Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Software architecture of the solutions SOA - Services Oriented Architecture, design, and implementation.

Acting in many clients such as Rede Tendência, Santander Bank, Nokia Siemens Network solving architectural and technical issues, business process and systems integration.
 
* Project: Exposure Services - SOA at Rede Tendência
Description: Development of services (WebServices) used for the exchange of information between business partners.

Core Responsibilities:
- Assessment, Documentation and creation of services through WebServices to integrating partners and enterprise portal;
- Definition of Architecture for Exhibition Services;
- Functional Specification;
- Canonical Model;
- Develop services.

* Project: Elaboração de PDP – Risco de Solvência at Santander Bank
Description: Automate all process of risk area to generate automatically all financial reports to Brazilian Central Bank and Santander Bank in Spain
Core responsibilities: Understand current process through interviews and elaborate a group of workflows using BMPN notation and all documents together with UML diagrams.

* Project: Portal OE at Nokia Siemens Network
Description: Management, status and analytic report of all information previously loaded through Excel files.
Core responsibilities: Maintenance, Bug Fix, Understand, document and Implement new features, meetings and delivery using JEE architecture, Spring, BIRT Report and DB Postgres.
